Monoly

The enterprise collaboration platform that puts data privacy first.



Monoly opens secure project spaces and communication channels between companies and teams, free of 3rd party oversight.

Join the Monoly Network to streamline your organization's internal communication and to collaborate securely with external partners. Any data exchanged on Monoly belongs to you and your recipients.

Monoly will never see or store your data. Ever.
  • home
  • Features
  • Experience
  • Team
  • Blog
  • Contact

FEATURES PRIVACY

Work seamlessly
with external partners.

Monoly helps you communicate professionally and share files securely with internalteammates and external partners. Send secure messages and protected files to people and organizations you trust.

Know where your
data lives.

Whether working internally or externally, Monoly helps you control who has access to what data and choose where data gets stored. Save and exchange data from your organization’s servers, free from 3rd party surveillance.

Harness the power of
Monoly's enterprise blockchain.

Monoly’s proprietary enterprise blockchain infrastructure goes far beyond yesterday’s blockchain. Monoly connects and verifies organizations’ servers without ever collecting data. Use Monoly as your link to the future of secure data exchange.
"Experience the best of email, messaging, and file sharing
all in one secure tool."

EXPERIENCE PRODUCTIVITY

Keep projects on track and meet shared goals.

Save important information for youself, tag critical information for your team, and start new discussions to keep projects on track and tackle shared goals.

Send secure messages to other collaborators.

Collaborate professionally with internal team members and external partners. Send group messages with the ability to react, respond, edit, and delete.

Share files with confidence.

Select who has access to which files and set permission levels on a person-by-person basis.

Keep personal and organizational data secure.

Oversee how you want to handle data at the end of a discussion. Delete data from alll servers or lock and store data long-term. You decide how to best keep infomration safe.

TEAM PROFESSIONAL

Kiwoon Sung

Founder and CEO

Formerly, Kiwoon Sung was the Head of Blockchain Research Lab at Samsung SDS. He led the enterprise blockchain core technology research and development including distributed networking systems.

He studied Computer Science at Columbia University and he was a visiting scholar at Georgia Institute of Technology. He has published more than 40 patents and conference papers in the field of the blockchain and networking systems.

Sangbum Kim

Co-founder and CTO

Sangbum was a Principal Engineer at Samsung SDS charged in audio/video processing and low-latency networking core technology research and service development for enterprise.

He researched Distributed Systems in Computer Science at Seoul National University. At Monoly, he is dediated to develop the highly scalable service as a cloud native and formulate the future roadmap of the core technololgy.

Alex Keum

Co-founder and CBO
